name: The lost Shoe
description:
Description:
The main character decided to walk around a huge messy mansion. While wandering around the building, he has lost one shoe! Find that shoe by searching in the mansion, but beware - there might be something lurking inside!

Game controls:

Movement - W, A, S, D or arrow keys

Pick up objects - E

Throw objects - left mouse button

Pause menu - ESC

Fight the monsters by throwing various objects that are lying on the floor.

Created by 2-person team for GMTK game jam 2019
